name: Touhou Fugyouseki: Nightmare of Sleeping Girl
storyline: A mist is spreading, causing locals in Gensokyo to fall into a deep endless sleep. Yukari gathers and guides the few remaining souls who remain awake to fight their way through endless waves of enemies as they wake up their friends and bring down the mastermind of this whole incident
summary: Touhou Fugyouseki ~ Nightmare of Sleeping Girl is an SRPG released by Kamo, based upon AliceSoft's Widenyo.
